Like-Like was still sitting in one spot, sleeping, and drooling. He was wok=
en up by Magmatron's comm link call. He howls in rage, but then thinks abou=
t what M<agmatron may need and replies.

Like-Like: Where is Master at? Lik=
e-Like will help...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dachande 
  To=
: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, February 19, 2001 11:29 PM
  Subj=
ect: Re: Alliance Proposal


  ::Magmatron::
   
      "Zardus, you have my=
 full attention," He said. "What do you want us to do? [To the ship and all=
 Destrons] We are attacking Hell Beast."
   
  ::Destrons::
   
      They =
all went to the gun room and got some powerful weapons. Dachande loaded up =
and went to the front. Battera did the same. The Nightmares did and got rea=
dy for full on combat. Praetorian got ready, as well as Jynx.
   
  ::Vukod=
lak::
   
      His time of awakening was coming close. He would destroy wh=
at ever was left of the Autobots and the Decepticons.
      
    ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
    From: Yanshosh@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
    Sent: Monday, February 19, 2001 10:55 PM
    Subject: Re: Alliance=
 Proposal


    ::Killfest/Zardus/FZ/Bloodystrike::

    Killfest enters th=
e conference room in time to hear DrillBit and 
    Darkfate talking about =
the Alliance's proposal. He nods.

    "Yes, I would enjoy a chance at batt=
le against Hell Beast," he says, 
    waiting for Zardus to reply to DarkFa=
te.
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Zardus taps a few buttons, =
making the channel that he and Darkfate 
    were on secure.

    "My scann=
ers detect only two of his Predacons in your area," he says 
    to Darkfat=
e, "I have a potential mutiny in my base, so I don't know 
    if I can sen=
d troops."

    He frowns, noticing something on the scanner reports of the=
 CF. 
    Unitron's signature was there, but Unitron was also in the base..=


    "I have to go for a few moments," he says to Darkfate, "There's 
    =
something I need to take care of."

    He closes the channel and turns to =
FZ.

    "Go to the CF and oversee that everything is going fine. There's 
=
    something up."

    FZ nods, turning around and walking out of the brid=
ge. He exits the 
    Iron Fist and blasts off, heading toward the CF at to=
p speed.

    Zardus turns back in his chair, remembering something. The De=
strons! 
    They were allies of the Alliance as well..

    "Zardus to Mag=
matron," he says into his comm, opening a channel to 
    Magmatron, "My tr=
oops are currently attacking Hell Beast's base. If 
    you could aid us th=
ere, or perhaps attack his troops at the 
    Cybertronian Fire, it would b=
e greatly appreciated and repaid. I 
    await your answer."

    He closes=
 the channel, sending a transmission to Darkfate again. "I'm 
    sending a=
 bot to help you out. That's all I can muster at the moment 
    though."

=
    He taps a few buttons, sending Bloodystrike an order.
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    Bloodystrike sighs, changing course half-way to th=
e Alliance base and 
    heading for the Black Fortress instead.




    --=

r any posting today from me, for two 
    reasons.

    > 
    > Vehement/=
Shockwave/Reflector/Sun Crusher/Unicron/The Protectobots:
    > 
    > 
   =
 > 
    > 
    > Vehement was lying on the ground, but kept his blood red o=
ptics 
    looking at 
    > the sun as the solar technology in them absorb=
ed great amounts of 
    energy, his 
    > overall power level back up to =
65% again.  
    > 
    > He stood, firing off a wide blast of optic energy=
, intercepting 
    three charges 
    > heading for Sun Crusher.  Twenty f=
ive blasts struck Vehement's 
    armor, not 
    > penetrating it or even =
coming close to it.
    > 
    > The ginormous robot stretched an arm with =
a sick smile.  His left 
    arm 
    > transformed into a wide cannon as a=
 eight foot long broadsword 
    appeared in 
    > his right hand.
    > 
=
    > Raising the cannon of an arm, he launching two energy-signature 
    =
seeking 
    > missiles at Iron Raptor's abdomen.
    > 
    > Moving the p=
oint of the broadsword to point at Condor, a fire ball 
    errupting 
    =
> from it at the enemy's chest.
    > 
    > ---
    > 
    > Reflector fel=
t a surge of power, that told him Unicron was 
    siphoning more 
    > po=
wer to him.  Getting up and ignoring the pain as twenty-three 
    shots du=
g 
    > into his body, he raised an arm, launching two missile at IRIS fro=
m 
    his wrist 
    > cannon.
    > 
    > ---
    > 
    > Sun Crusher r=
olled to the left, the explosions from the charge 
    sending him 
    > f=
lipping through the air, slamming painfully to his legs, almost 
    causin=
g him 
    > to crash to the ground.  "That's it, heathens," he said, spitt=
ing 
    mech-fluid 
    > into the burnt grass before him, "you want to di=
e painfully, be my 
    guest."
    > 
    > With that, his shaped twisted =
into the form of a tank, Sun Crusher 
    the hover 
    > tank bringing a =
long barrel to point at the CF, launching three 
    explosive 
    > shell=
s from the bowels of the tank.
    > 
    > ---
    > 
    > Unicron, still=
 disguised as Unitron, activated a comm. link to all 
    Alliance 
    > m=
embers at the scene of the Cybertronian Fire.  
    > 
    > "All Alliance =
warriors, this is Unitron," his voice sounding 
    exactly like 
    > Uni=
tron's, his appearance the same as well, "I received orders from 
    Zardu=
s, 
    > leave everyone alone and focus solely on crippling the Cybertroni=
an 
    Fire 
    > beyond repair.  Then make a full retreat."
    > 
    >=
 =3D=3D=3D
    > 
    > Shockwave was flying at his top speed for atmospher=
ic conditions in 
    his space 
    > fighter mode, arming all his weapons=
.  The cause would not fall.
    > 
    > =3D=3D=3D
    > 
    > Hot Spot l=
ooked at two CR chambers, noticing First Aid and Blades 
    were still 
  =
  > badly damaged.  He then looked over to Groove and Streetwise.
    > 
  =
  > "Blades is closer to being repaired.  I will stay here and have him 
  =
  go out to 
    > help you while you attack the enemies outside.
    > 
  =
  > Groove and Streetwise nodded, runinng as fast as they could for 
    th=
eir nearest 
    > exit out of the ship that wasn't a large hole in the shi=
p.
